property.name: nimbus.seeds
property.description: Comma-delimited list of the hosts running nimbus server.

property.name: topology.min.replication.count.default
property.description: Default minimum number of nimbus hosts where the code must be replicated before leader nimbus can mark the topology as active and create assignments.

property.name: topology.min.replication.count
property.description: Calculated minimum number of nimbus hosts where the code must be replicated before leader nimbus can mark the topology as active and create assignments.

property.name: topology.max.replication.wait.time.sec.default
property.description: Default maximum wait time for the nimbus host replication to achieve the nimbus.min.replication.count. Once this time is elapsed nimbus will go ahead and perform topology activation tasks even if required nimbus.min.replication.count is not achieved

property.name: topology.max.replication.wait.time.sec
property.description: Calculated maximum wait time for the nimbus host replication to achieve the nimbus.min.replication.count. Once this time is elapsed nimbus will go ahead and perform topology activation tasks even if required nimbus.min.replication.count is not achieved

property.name: nimbus.host
property.description: Deprecated config in favor of nimbus.seeds used during non HA mode.
